Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: This space is an opulent array of rich wood tones accented by vivid cerulean wallpaper that matches the hue found in the carpets and curtains found throughout. Sweeping upward to the west before doubling back on itself, the landing is overlooked by an ornate leaded window set with smaller panes in a myriad of jewel-tones. The finely-detailed banister is carved in a tumble of olive and oak leaves with a large fleur-de-lis set into each of the supports running the entire length of the staircase. An impressive gilt chandelier hung with hundreds of tiny glass crystals washes a golden glow over the rich wood tones of the room.

This space is an opulent array of rich wood tones accented by vivid cerulean wallpaper that matches the hue found in the carpets and curtains found throughout. Sweeping upward to the west before doubling back on itself, the landing is overlooked by an ornate leaded window set with smaller panes in a myriad of jewel-tones. The finely-detailed banister is carved in a tumble of olive and oak leaves with a large fleur-de-lis set into each of the supports running the entire length of the staircase. An impressive gilt chandelier hung with hundreds of tiny glass crystals washes a golden glow over the rich wood tones of the room.

This space is an opulent array of rich wood tones accented by vivid cerulean wallpaper that matches the hue found in the carpets and curtains found throughout. Sweeping upward to the west before doubling back on itself, the landing is overlooked by an ornate leaded window set with smaller panes in a myriad of jewel-tones. The finely-detailed banister is carved in a tumble of olive and oak leaves with a large fleur-de-lis set into each of the supports running the entire length of the staircase. An impressive gilt chandelier hung with hundreds of tiny glass crystals washes a golden glow over the rich wood tones of the room.

A wide arch leads to the east, topped with a semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the opening. The fluted frame surrounding the archway is painted a flawless porcelain white, the panel decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading south

Each side of the arched double door leading to the south is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
